text: So Moses took the redemption money for those over and above the ones redeemed by the Levites.
They brought with them the priestly garments, the first fruits, and the tithes; and they brought forward the nazirites who had completed the time of their vows.
My eyes will flow without ceasing, without rest,
But the angel of the Lord went down into the furnace with Azariah and his companions, drove the fiery flames out of the furnace,
